name: Desert Storm (itch) (FunkyDealer)
description:
Desert Storm - A student game Made by a Video Game Engineering student

I made this for a 3d programing course, hopefully it wont have any bugs but its not very feature lengthy.  ( ﾟ，_ゝ｀) The tank model and the world textures aren't mine, the Terrain is generated from a height map and the tank's bullet was made by me.

Its a 3d game where 2 tanks fight each others, the game features split screen and can be played with either keyboard or controller, at least 1 windows compatible controller is recommended to play. for optional experience, use 2 controllers or 1 keyboard + 1 controller.

the tanks moves with WASD/IJKL/Left Analog Stick and Aims with Arrows/Pgkeys/Right Analog and you shoot with Space/LeftControl/R2.

whenever a tank dies, it will respawn in the furthest edge. The game features a weather system that randomly switches between clear and rainy, Time of day also constantly changes.

if you don't act on one of the tanks for 30 seconds, a wandering boid(AI) will startup, all it does it wander around aimlessly so use it for target practice! You can any time get back control from the AI by pressing any of that tank's controls

Thank you very much for checking it out and leave a comment! ヽ(￣～￣　)ノ
